Translation.Value: No cells set, please use /jail set [name] first!
No cell named {0} found!
New cell named {0} created where you stand!
Cell named {0} already exists!
Cell named {0} deleted!
Jail Cells: {0}
That player cannot be arrested!
Player {0} already in Jail!
Convict {0} was arrested in {1} cell!
Ex-convict {0} released from Jail!
Players: {0}
Jail cells are getting dusty!
No player found named {0}!

Jail Cell: {0}, Jail Time: {1}, released in: {2}
You have been released! Congratulations!
Get back in your cell!
/jail commands: add, remove, set, unset, list, teleport
use /jail add <player> <time> <cell> - to arrest a player, if no <cell> uses a random one
use /jail remove <player> - to release a player
use /jail list players or /jail list cells
use /jail set <cell> - to set a new jail cell
use /jail unset <cell> - to delete a jail cell
use /jail teleport <cell> - to teleport to a cell
You have been banned for disconnecting while in Jail!
You have been banned for {0} seconds for disconnecting while in Jail!
